text: Good mosque in Jurong, clean toilet, nice arsitektur.

A very beautiful mosque internally and the surrounding area. Attended a weeding ceremony at this location. The facilities, a hall by itself, are good and the attending staff are very welcoming and friendly. Due to the covid situation, the ceremony are give 30 minutes to complete. A grace period are given for a control photo session for the families. All things considered, this is a good place to hold a wedding ceremony.
Good place for prayer. Spacious with all the facilities

A lovely & comfortable mosque nestled in the Taman Jurong residential estates. Went there for Solat Subuh during the pandemic.. and the staff were very professional in the way they handled the arrangements. Alhamdullilah.
One of the major and beautiful Mosque in Singapore. Due to COVID, nowadays for praying here, you need to appointment first. Both male and female perform their prayer here.
